value:
I will master the dark arts, even if I
must destroy a world or three to
do it. What? I'm being serious!

You can't do anything without power,
including...protect those whom you
must protect.$k$pSo that's why I must master the
dark arts at any cost.

I keep my distance because I need to.
I've got a lot on my mind. And that
means I need to be alone...a lot.

Not like I noticed...but you should
rest sometimes. These patrols of
yours are going to burn you out.$k$pAnd then I'll have to do more work.

Well, don't you have a spring in
your step? I have to admit, I find that
pretty...well, irritating.$k$pBut that's just me. You go right on
ahead. Maybe it'll rub off.

It was a pain getting here, but
I was told to stop by to say
hello, $Nu.

With this kind of power, I can
finally—! Hmm, never mind.
I must get stronger. I have to!
Blast! I need to do much better.

What use are thanks? Instead, I'll
show you what power can do.

I am trying to learn the deepest
secrets of the dark arts. But if you
must know...the name's Raigh.

Sheesh. You just can't help poking
your nose in my business, can you?
Well, fine.$k$pThing is, maybe since you did keep
prodding me, I might have gotten
better than I would have otherwise.$k$pHey, I said maybe. That's all.$k$pI know you only spent time with me
because you feel sorry for...
well, whatever has me twisted up.$k$pRight? You don't need to admit it.
Besides, I'm the one who got
the short end of the stick here.$k$pNow that I'm stuck with you,
I have one more person I need
to look out for! So, uh, thanks.
フン
フフン
うああっ！
...Hmph.
Merciless massacre!
Behold, real power!
Darkness, serve me!
Pfft! How boring.
Fools...
Heh.
What do you want?
Enough. You have my attention.
You push yourself way too hard. And for what? Other people?
I have to admit, I've never met someone...quite like you.
Don't tell anyone that I'm anything but...diabolical.
I must protect...what I must protect!
You think I'll help you? You are fooling yourself.
Heh!
Fine...
All right.
